class.name: SpringBoneSimulator3D
class.brief_description: A [SkeletonModifier3D] to apply inertial wavering to bone chains.
class.description: This [SkeletonModifier3D] can be used to wiggle hair, cloth, and tails. This modifier behaves differently from [PhysicalBoneSimulator3D] as it attempts to return the original pose after modification. If you setup [method set_root_bone] and [method set_end_bone], it is treated as one bone chain. Note that it does not support a branched chain like Y-shaped chains. When a bone chain is created, an array is generated from the bones that exist in between and listed in the joint list. Several properties can be applied to each joint, such as [method set_joint_stiffness], [method set_joint_drag], and [method set_joint_gravity]. For simplicity, you can set values to all joints at the same time by using a [Curve]. If you want to specify detailed values individually, set [method set_individual_config] to [code]true[/code]. For physical simulation, [SpringBoneSimulator3D] can have children as self-standing collisions that are not related to [PhysicsServer3D], see also [SpringBoneCollision3D].

method.name: are_all_child_collisions_enabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the all child [SpringBoneCollision3D]s are contained in the collision list at [param index] in the settings.

method.name: clear_collisions
method.description: Clears all collisions from the collision list at [param index] in the settings when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: clear_exclude_collisions
method.description: Clears all exclude collisions from the collision list at [param index] in the settings when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: clear_settings
method.description: Clears all settings.

method.name: get_center_bone
method.description: Returns the center bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: get_center_bone_name
method.description: Returns the center bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: get_center_from
method.description: Returns what the center originates from in the bone chain.

method.name: get_center_node
method.description: Returns the center node path of the bone chain.

method.name: get_collision_count
method.description: Returns the collision count of the bone chain's collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: get_collision_path
method.description: Returns the node path of the [SpringBoneCollision3D] at [param collision] in the bone chain's collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: get_drag
method.description: Returns the drag force damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: get_drag_damping_curve
method.description: Returns the drag force damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: get_end_bone
method.description: Returns the end bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: get_end_bone_direction
method.description: Returns the end bone's tail direction of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_length
method.description: Returns the end bone's tail length of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_end_bone_name
method.description: Returns the end bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: get_exclude_collision_count
method.description: Returns the exclude collision count of the bone chain's exclude collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_exclude_collision_path
method.description: Returns the node path of the [SpringBoneCollision3D] at [param collision] in the bone chain's exclude collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: get_gravity
method.description: Returns the gravity amount of the bone chain.

method.name: get_gravity_damping_curve
method.description: Returns the gravity amount damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: get_gravity_direction
method.description: Returns the gravity direction of the bone chain.

method.name: get_joint_bone
method.description: Returns the bone index at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_bone_name
method.description: Returns the bone name at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_count
method.description: Returns the joint count of the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_drag
method.description: Returns the drag force at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_gravity
method.description: Returns the gravity amount at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_gravity_direction
method.description: Returns the gravity direction at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_radius
method.description: Returns the radius at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_rotation_axis
method.description: Returns the rotation axis at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_joint_stiffness
method.description: Returns the stiffness force at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list.

method.name: get_radius
method.description: Returns the joint radius of the bone chain.

method.name: get_radius_damping_curve
method.description: Returns the joint radius damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: get_root_bone
method.description: Returns the root bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: get_root_bone_name
method.description: Returns the root bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: get_rotation_axis
method.description: Returns the rotation axis of the bone chain.

method.name: get_stiffness
method.description: Returns the stiffness force of the bone chain.

method.name: get_stiffness_damping_curve
method.description: Returns the stiffness force damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: is_config_individual
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the config can be edited individually for each joint.

method.name: is_end_bone_extended
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the end bone is extended to have the tail.

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets a simulating state with respect to the current bone pose. It is useful to prevent the simulation result getting violent. For example, calling this immediately after a call to [method AnimationPlayer.play] without a fading, or within the previous [signal SkeletonModifier3D.modification_processed] signal if it's condition changes significantly.

method.name: set_center_bone
method.description: Sets the center bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: set_center_bone_name
method.description: Sets the center bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: set_center_from
method.description: Sets what the center originates from in the bone chain. Bone movement is calculated based on the difference in relative distance between center and bone in the previous and next frames. For example, if the parent [Skeleton3D] is used as the center, the bones are considered to have not moved if the [Skeleton3D] moves in the world. In this case, only a change in the bone pose is considered to be a bone movement.

method.name: set_center_node
method.description: Sets the center node path of the bone chain.

method.name: set_collision_count
method.description: Sets the number of collisions in the collision list at [param index] in the settings when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: set_collision_path
method.description: Sets the node path of the [SpringBoneCollision3D] at [param collision] in the bone chain's collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]false[/code].

method.name: set_drag
method.description: Sets the drag force of the bone chain. The greater the value, the more suppressed the wiggling. The value is scaled by [method set_drag_damping_curve] and cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_drag_damping_curve
method.description: Sets the drag force damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: set_enable_all_child_collisions
method.description: If sets [param enabled] to [code]true[/code], the all child [SpringBoneCollision3D]s are collided and [method set_exclude_collision_path] is enabled as an exclusion list at [param index] in the settings. If sets [param enabled] to [code]false[/code], you need to manually register all valid collisions with [method set_collision_path].

method.name: set_end_bone
method.description: Sets the end bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: set_end_bone_direction
method.description: Sets the end bone tail direction of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_length
method.description: Sets the end bone tail length of the bone chain when [method is_end_bone_extended] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_end_bone_name
method.description: Sets the end bone name of the bone chain. [b]Note:[/b] End bone must be the root bone or a child of the root bone. If they are the same, the tail must be extended by [method set_extend_end_bone] to jiggle the bone.

method.name: set_exclude_collision_count
method.description: Sets the number of exclude collisions in the exclude collision list at [param index] in the settings when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_exclude_collision_path
method.description: Sets the node path of the [SpringBoneCollision3D] at [param collision] in the bone chain's exclude collision list when [method are_all_child_collisions_enabled] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_extend_end_bone
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the end bone is extended to have the tail. The extended tail config is allocated to the last element in the joint list. In other words, if you set [param enabled] is [code]false[/code], the config of last element in the joint list has no effect in the simulated result.

method.name: set_gravity
method.description: Sets the gravity amount of the bone chain. If [param gravity] is not [code]0[/code], the modified pose will not return to the original pose since it is always affected by gravity. The value is scaled by [method set_gravity_damping_curve] and cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_gravity_damping_curve
method.description: Sets the gravity amount damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: set_gravity_direction
method.description: Sets the gravity direction of the bone chain. The value is cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_individual_config
method.description: If [param enabled] is [code]true[/code], the config can be edited individually for each joint.

method.name: set_joint_drag
method.description: Sets the drag force at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_joint_gravity
method.description: Sets the gravity amount at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_joint_gravity_direction
method.description: Sets the gravity direction at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_joint_radius
method.description: Sets the joint radius at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_joint_rotation_axis
method.description: Sets the rotation axis at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_joint_stiffness
method.description: Sets the stiffness force at [param joint] in the bone chain's joint list when [method is_config_individual] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_radius
method.description: Sets the joint radius of the bone chain. It is used to move and slide with the [SpringBoneCollision3D] in the collision list. The value is scaled by [method set_radius_damping_curve] and cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_radius_damping_curve
method.description: Sets the joint radius damping curve of the bone chain.

method.name: set_root_bone
method.description: Sets the root bone index of the bone chain.

method.name: set_root_bone_name
method.description: Sets the root bone name of the bone chain.

method.name: set_rotation_axis
method.description: Sets the rotation axis of the bone chain. If sets a specific axis, it acts like a hinge joint. The value is cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_stiffness
method.description: Sets the stiffness force of the bone chain. The greater the value, the faster it recovers to its initial pose. If [param stiffness] is [code]0[/code], the modified pose will not return to the original pose. The value is scaled by [method set_stiffness_damping_curve] and cached in each joint setting in the joint list.

method.name: set_stiffness_damping_curve
method.description: Sets the stiffness force damping curve of the bone chain.

constants.constant: Enumerated value for the axis from a parent bone to the child bone.
The world origin is defined as center.
The [Node3D] specified by [method set_center_node] is defined as center. If [Node3D] is not found, the parent [Skeleton3D] is treated as center.
The bone pose origin of the parent [Skeleton3D] specified by [method set_center_bone] is defined as center. If [Node3D] is not found, the parent [Skeleton3D] is treated as center.
Enumerated value for the rotation of the X axis.
Enumerated value for the rotation of the Y axis.
Enumerated value for the rotation of the Z axis.
Enumerated value for the unconstrained rotation.
